name: Spring Creek
description: Famous limestone spring creek running through State College. All-tackle trophy section. Year-round fishing.

seasonal.springNotes: Excellent Hendrickson and Sulphur hatches. Spring stocking in March-April.
seasonal.summerNotes: Trico hatches in early morning. Water stays cool year-round.
seasonal.fallNotes: Blue-Winged Olive hatches. Fall stocking in October.
seasonal.winterNotes: Year-round fishing. Midge hatches throughout winter.

hatches.notes: One of the first major hatches of spring
Year-round hatch, especially important in winter

name: Penns Creek
description: Freestone stream with excellent insect hatches. One of PA premier wild trout streams.

seasonal.springNotes: Grannom hatch in mid-April. March Brown in late March.
seasonal.summerNotes: Isonychia hatch in June. Excellent dry fly fishing.

name: Loyalsock Creek
description: Scenic mountain stream with quality trout and bass fishing.

seasonal.summerNotes: Good bass fishing in lower sections.

name: Pine Creek
description: Pennsylvania Grand Canyon stream with diverse fishing opportunities.

seasonal.springNotes: Brook trout in headwaters. Spring stocking.
seasonal.fallNotes: Fall colors make this a beautiful time to fish.

name: Raystown Lake
description: PA largest lake with exceptional multi-species fishing. 30 miles long, 200 feet deep.

seasonal.springNotes: Excellent bass fishing. Walleye spawn in April.
seasonal.summerNotes: Deep water fishing for bass and walleye. Topwater action.
seasonal.fallNotes: Excellent fall fishing. Muskie season peaks.

name: Monongahela River
description: Major river system with excellent smallmouth bass and walleye fishing.

seasonal.springNotes: Excellent spring fishing for bass and walleye.

name: Allegheny River
description: Major river with diverse fishing opportunities from Pittsburgh upstream.

seasonal.springNotes: Trout fishing in upper sections. Bass fishing throughout.

name: Youghiogheny River
description: Scenic river with excellent trout and bass fishing. Popular for fly fishing.

seasonal.springNotes: Excellent trout fishing in upper sections.

name: Chartiers Creek
description: Urban creek with improving trout fishing.

seasonal.summerNotes: Summer fishing good in cooler sections.
